productName: Intel Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor
description: Intel 12th Gen Pentium Gold G7400 Alder Lake Processor is a CPU from Intel. Intel Pentium Gold G7400 12th gen Processor turns your desktop computer system or data server into a more efficient machine. This 12th generation 3.7 GHz processor features two Performance cores and 6MB of cache with support for up to four threads, providing the power to run and multitask a variety of applications. The Pentium Gold G7400 also includes support for PCI Express 5.0 and dual-channel DDR5 memory in addition to having integrated Intel UHD 710 Graphics. An Intel Laminar RS1 thermal solution is included.
keyFeatures: Cache: 6 MB Intel Smart Cache, Socket: LGA 1700

productName: AMD Athlon 200GE AM4 Socket Desktop Processor with Radeon Vega 3 Graphics
description: AMD Athlon Pro 200GE is a dual-core Processor with SMT-enabled, so it has four threads active and 512 KB L2 cache per core, and 4 MB shared L3 cache. The base clock is 3.20 GHz. The primary limitation is PCI-Express 3.0 at x8 for graphics. Raven Ridge is an unlocked processor, that enabled multiplier we managed to get a proper 3.9 GHz out of the two cores at a voltage of 1.4 volts. One thing you do need to keep in mind is that the memory will be restricted to 2667 MHz maximum (dual-channel).

productName: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G Desktop Processor with Radeon RX Vega 11 Graphics
description: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G Intelligent Desktop Processor is able to provide high-performance computing experience. The revolutionary AMD multi-threaded processor has 4 cores and 8 threads for ensuring blazing fast performance basic work & professional game play. This micro-device also equipped with most powerful Radeon RX Vega graphics containing advanced â€˜Vegaâ€™ graphics technology to deliver fast & smooth gaming performance. This graphics armed with most advanced, powerful computing combined in a single processor to create an impact on heavy duty performance without compromise. The most compatible AM4 socket for AMD Ryzen Ready AM4 Chipset motherboards gives the new future-proof platform. AMD SenseMI technology uses true machine intelligence and Master Utility provides Simple and Powerful Overclocking facility.

productName: Intel Core i3 10105F 10th Gen Processor
description: Intel 10th Generation Core i3-10105F Processor having the base frequency of 3.70 GHz that can be reached as max turbo frequency at 4.40 GHz. It has the L3 SmartCache of 6 MB containing 4 cores and 8 threads. With a bus speed of 8 GT/s, it has thermal design power (TDP) rating of 65W. This latest microchip has few expansion options such 3.0 PCI express revision having configured up to 1x16, 2x8, 1x8+2x4 and maximum 16 lanes. Considering the memory this processor has dual channel of max 128GB of size that supports up to DDR4-2666 bus speed.

productName: AMD Ryzen 5 5500 Processor
description: MD Ryzen 5 5500 Processor is 6 processor cores, 12 threads, and an astonishingly efficient 45-65W TDP. This processor, It stands with 3.9GHz Base Clock, 4.4GHz Max Boost Clock, 3MB L2 Cache, 16MB L3 Cache with AM4 Package, and TSMC 7nm FinFET CMOS. This processor is built with PCIe 3.0 x8 and Wraith Spire Thermal Solution. The AMD Ryzen 5 5500 Processor provides DDR4 Up to 3200MHz memory with 2 memory channels. It has AMD StoreMI Technology. A fast and easy way to expand and accelerate the storage in a desktop PC with an AMD Ryzen processor. AMD StoreMI technology is a powerful tool for PC enthusiasts that want to improve load times, boot times, file management, or system responsiveness. Whatever your storage acceleration needs, AMD StoreMI technology automatically pairs your most-used files with an SSD cache for peak performance.  MD StoreMI technology can get files running at SSD-like speeds. Simply add an SSD to your system and let StoreMI do the rest.

productName: Intel Core i3-12100F 12th Gen Alder Lake Processor
description: The latest Intel 12th Gen Core i3-12100F Processor comes with 4 cores and 8 threads. It has a base frequency of 3.30 GHz and a maximum boost frequency of up to 4.30 GHz. The i3-12100F Alder Lake Processor comes with a 12 MB Intel Smart Cache and it has a 5 MB L2 cache. It features a Processor Base Power of 58W and a maximum turbo power of 89W. The Intel Core i3-12100F comes with 2 memory channels and it supports 128GB of maximum memory. The maximum bandwidth is 76.8 GB/s.
keyFeatures: Clock Speed: 3.30 GHz Up to 4.30 GHz

productName: Intel 11th Gen Core i5-11400 Rocket Lake Processor
description: This Core i5-11400 Processor comes with Intel UHD Graphics 730. This new 11th gen Rocket Lake microarchitecture is manufactured with the 14nm process that comes with six cores and twelve threads. As this chip is updated to the latest BIOS revision, it nicely fits into any Intel 400 and 500 series motherboards. Focusing on this, all the major motherboard manufacturers have already started BIOS updates for their 400 and 500 series lineup. These Processors also support 64-bit computing on Intel architecture require an Intel x86-64 (64 bit) architecture-enabled BIOS.
keyFeatures: Clock Speed: 2.60 GHz Up to 4.40 GHz

productName: Intel 12th Gen Core i5-12400F Alder Lake Processor
description: The latest Intel Core i5-12400F processor featured with 6 Golden Cove. This 12th gen Core o comes with 6 cores and 12 threads. The P-cores (Golden Cove) will operate at a base frequency of 2.50 GHz and a maximum boost frequency of up to 4.40 GHz. The i5-12400F Alder Lake Processor will feature 25 MB of L3 cache and TDP values are maintained at 65 W (PL1). The latest Intel Core i5-12400F has six hyperthreaded P-cores, according to information from a Bilibili leaker spotted by Twitter user HXL. This Alder Lake model will not receive any energy-efficient E-cores. The higher-positioned models, Intel has previously confirmed. The processor would also have an 18MB L3 cache and a 65W TDP increase the clock it would be 4.4GHz on a single core and 4.0GHz on all cores.
keyFeatures: Base Clock Speed: 2.50 GHz Up to 4.40 GHz

productName: BIOSTAR H510MHP 10th and 11th Gen Micro ATX Motherboard
description: The BIOSTAR H510MHP is a micro ATX motherboard designed for 10th and 11th gen Intel Core processors. It features an Intel H510 single-chip architecture, allowing for efficient and stable performance. It offers a 5-phase VRM design with high-quality power components such as low RDS (on) Mosfet for lower temperatures and has the advantage to raise the overclocking ability. The BIOSTAR H510MHP motherboard supports 2-DIMM DDR4 memory, with speeds of up to 3200/ 2933/ 2666/ 2400/2133/ 1866 and a maximum capacity of 64 GB. It also supports PCIe 4.0 and PCIe M.2 (32Gb/s) for high-speed data transfer and storage. PCIe M.2 32Gb/s is the latest storage interface, it delivers the highest bandwidth and lower latency. It's 3 times faster compared with PCIe M.2 10Gb/s. It comes with USB 3.2 Gen1 for quick data transfer and device connectivity. The Onboard HDMI connector allows full video & audio support. It has industry-leading high-definition video quality. The BIOSTAR H510MHP motherboard provides high-quality sound with minimal loss of audio fidelity.
keyFeatures: Supported CPU: 10th /11th Generation Intel Core Processor
Supported RAM: 2x DIMM, DDR4 3200 up to 64 GB
Graphics Output: 1 x HDMI, 1 x VGA Port
Features: 1 x M.2 Slot, Realtek ALC887

productName: MSI PRO H410M-B 10th Gen Micro-ATX Motherboard
description: The MSI PRO H410M-B Motherboard supports 10th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold & Celeron processors for LGA 1200 socket. It supports DDR4 Memory, up to 2933(Max) MHz. This motherboard helps users work smarter by delivering an efficient and productive experience. It features tons of convenient and smart designs for DIY users, countless system tuning and troubleshooting tools are at your disposal to push your system to new heights and satisfy even the most demanding tweaker. Makes it so easy to install your own motherboard without any issue. It has a VGA port, supports a maximum resolution of 2048x1536 60Hz, 1920x1200 60Hz. It also has an HDMI 1.4 port, supports a maximum resolution of 4K 30Hz. The MSI PRO H410M-B lets you manage speeds and temperatures for all your system and CPU fans. Total Fan Control allows you to check your primary system characteristics in a simplified graphical interface. You can also set up to 4 temperature targets for the CPU and motherboard, which will adjust the fan speeds.

Supports DDR4 Memory, up to 2933(Max) MHz
Core Boost, DDR4 Boost, Turbo M.2

productName: G.Skill Trident Z 8GB DDR4 3200MHz Desktop RAM White
description: The G.Skill Trident Z 8GB DDR4 3200MHz Desktop RAM is created for PC enthusiasts, overclockers, and hardcore gamers, and is extensively tested for durability, compatibility, and performance across a broad range of motherboards. The Trident Z series, which builds on the popularity of the G.SKILL Trident series, is one of the world's highest-performance DDR4 DRAM memory built for PC enthusiasts and intense gamers. The Trident Z series, which uses only the best-in-class components and luxurious hair-line finish aluminum heat-spreaders, is the cutting-edge DDR4 solution that combines performance and beauty for PC enthusiasts and extreme overclockers looking to build an ultra-fast PC or break new overclocking records. All Trident Z DDR4 memory kits are rigorously validated on key performance motherboard manufacturers using G.SKILL's rigorous validation methodology to assure best-in-class stability and compatibility across the broadest range of motherboards.

productName: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM
description: The CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM features individually addressable RGB lighting while delivering outstanding performance optimized for Intel and AMD motherboards. It is compatible with Intel 300 Series, Intel 400 Series, Intel 500 Series, Intel 600 Series, AMD 300 Series, AMD 400 Series, AMD 500 Series. Illuminate your system with dynamic RGB lighting from six individually addressable RGB LEDs, encased in a panoramic light pipe that offers unobstructed viewing from virtually every angle. It features a beautifully designed aluminum heat spreader that conducts heat away from your memory for superb cooling even when overclocked, with modern styling to complement your RGB lighting. It has been engineered for performance with a custom high-performance PCB and carefully screened memory chips deliver maximum bandwidth and tight response times. The CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS comes with a lifetime warranty.
keyFeatures: Optimized for Intel and AMD motherboards

productName: G.Skill Trident Z NEO RGB 8GB 3600MHz Gaming Desktop RAM
description: The exclusive Trident Z Neo brings unparalleled memory performance and vibrant RGB lighting to any gaming PC or workstation with latest AMD Ryzen CPUs and AMD DDR4 motherboards. This Gaming RAM is Crafted with hand-screened memory ICs and custom 10-layer PCBs, each and every module is made for maintaining the best signal integrity to achieve fast overclocking performance. Tested across a wide range of motherboards to strict quality standards, Trident Z Neo memory kits are built for reliability, stability, and compatibility. It is Fully control and customize the 8-zone RGB lighting through the downloadable Trident Z Lighting Control software. productName: Netac N930E Pro 128GB NVMe M.2 2280 SSD
description: The Netac N930E Pro 128GB SSD is made for both laptop and desktop use and it has a form factor of 2280. The SSD has a storage capacity of 128GB with read and write speed of 975MB/s and 650MB/s accordingly. The Netac SSD are made to provide you with fast and constant data flow to ease your work and also helps to get your work done faster and efficiently.

productName: Kingston A400 120GB 2.5 inch SATA 3 Internal SSD
description: Kingston A400 120GB is a 2.5 inch SATA 3 supported Internal SSD. It delivers a a hi-performance hi-speed with a good reading and writing speed. This SSD is part of Kingston's A400 Series SATA 3.This SSD has SATA Rev. 3.0 (6Gbps) with backwards compatibility to SATA Rev. 2.0 (3Gbps) as connection Interface. It is available in 2.5 Inch Sata 3.0. Kingstonâ€™s A400 solid-state drive dramatically improves the responsiveness of your existing system with incredible boot, loading and transfer times compared to mechanical hard drives. Powered by a latest-gen controller for read and write speeds of up to 500MB/s and 450MB/s1, this SSD is 10x faster than a traditional hard drive for higher performance, ultra-responsive multi-tasking and an overall faster system. Also more reliable and durable than a hard drive, A400 is available in multiple capacities from 120GB to 1.92TB . These 2.5 inch SSDs works with lower power, lower heat and quicker loading time. This SSD is Ideal for laptops & small form factor PCs.
keyFeatures: Model: A400 120GB 2.5 inch SATA 3 Internal SSD

productName: Biwintech NX500 128GB M.2 2280 PCIe NVMe SSD
description: The Biwintech NX500 128GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD utilizes M.2 connectors and supports 4-channel PCIe 3.0 and NVMe 1.3 protocols. It has a read speed of up to 2100MB/s. The latest 3D NAND TLC flash cells are carefully selected to provide exceptional storage density and reliability. The NX500 has passed rigorous testing for performance, reliability, power loss protection, applications, and compatibility with the latest motherboards. Biwintech NX500 also supports LDPC for reliable and worry-free data storage. With its wear-leveling functionality, the drive’s lifespan is extended.

productName: Gigabyte 128GB M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0x2 NVMe SSD
description: The Gigabyte M.2 PCIe SSD 128GB uses the Host Memory Buffer(HMB) feature to use the Direct Memory Access(DMA) of PCI Express which allows the SSD to use some of the DRAM on your PC. This allows the SSD to not use its own DRAM. This increases the performance of your daily work by boosting the performance of your controller and NAND Flash. The Sequential reading speed of this SSD is 1100MB/s and the writing speed is 500MB/s. You also get the facility of transferring your data faster compared to HDD. When we compare SSD to HDD we find that the SSD performs faster, Consumes less power, has better Vibration Resistance, there is no sound when the SSD is working and the best feature of SSD is that the Heat management is very good. Gigabyte has launched an application, which is the SSD Tool Box, that helps users to monitor how their SSD is performing. The information that you might get are, the health condition of the SSD, the drive optimization and also the temperature reading of the SSD. We are providing you with 3 years of warranty on the SSD.

productName: HP EX900 M.2 500GB PCIe NVMe Internal SSD
description: Revolutionize large file handling and response times with HP PCIe NVME TLC 500GB SSD M.2 Drive, a remarkably affordable and innovative PCIe-based NVMe memory SSD storage solution.Streamline your workflows Tackle large files and reduce your work time from hours to minutes with a solid state drive powered by M.2 PCIe NVMe technology.Budget-conscious innovation Access affordable high performance with a triple layer (TLC) architecture that stacks three cell layers on top of one another.

productName: Patriot P300 M.2 PCIe Gen 3 x4 512GB SSD

The P300 is guaranteed to improve start-up, loading, and transfer times over traditional hard disk drives. Advanced wear-leveling and thermal management features extend the life of the drive for maximum use. Boost your computerâ€™s performance with quicker application loading times for a better overall experience and productivity while transferring heavy workloads without the lag. productName: Transcend 115S 500GB M.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 NVMe SSD (M-Key)
Antec META V350 350W Power Supply
description: The Antec META V350 is a 350-watt power supply unit that comes with a 24-pin connector (520mm in length), an 8-pin connector for EPS12V (4+4-pin) (550mm in length), an 8-pin connector for PCI-E (6+2-pin) (550mm in length), two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each), and two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each). The PSU comes with a Thermal Manager and a 120mm silent fan. It is an advanced low-voltage fan control for optimal heat & noise management and will allow your PSU to stay at an optimal temperature. The 120 mm Silent Fan is ideal for quiet computing and is designed for longer life, guaranteeing hours of operation. It has an AC input voltage of 230VAC, with a frequency range of 47-63Hz and an input current of 5A. The DC output consists of +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb with maximum current ratings of 18A, 16A, 42A, 0.3A, and 2.5A respectively. The total combined power of the output is 110W, 300W, 3.6W, and 12.5W. The total wattage of the power supply is 350W.
keyFeatures: Produces less noise and less heat

productName: Gamdias AURA GP550 550W Power Supply
Gamdias Kratos E1-600W RGB Power Supply
Montech Beta 550 550W 80 Plus Bronze Certified Power Supply
description: The Montech Beta 550 Bronze is a 550W power supply that has been certified with 80 PLUS Bronze efficiency. It uses high-quality components, including Japanese main industrial-level electronic capacitors, to ensure stable wattage output and reliable performance. The power supply is also optimized to work with all generations of Intel and AMD processors to maximize energy saving. The power supply has an ATX12V version of the form factor, and its power factor correction (PFC) is active PFC (>0.9 typical). The input voltage can range from 100-240Vac, and the input current is 8A. The power supply's fan size is 120mm, which helps to keep the system cool while also remaining silent. The hold-up time is 10 msec (minimum) at 80% of full load at 230Vac input, which means that it can handle high power demands without interruption.

productName: DeepCool PK550D 550 Watt 80 PLUS Bronze Power Supply
description: The DeepCool PK-D series power supply offers consistent 80 PLUS Bronze efficiency for steady, low-noise performance while powering computer system builds. Under normal load circumstances, the PK-D series, which is 80 PLUS Bronze certified, may run at up to 85% efficiency while limiting wasted heat generation and lowering energy costs. Because it is designed for the +3.3V and +5V rails, this highly effective DC-DC board aids in more accurate voltage regulation and improves system compatibility for components of the next generation. It is built to function without difficulty at temperatures as high as 40°C and altitudes as high as 5000m while delivering constant, reliable power production. To comply with worldwide ErP Lot 6 criteria and reduce total energy consumption, it was also designed to be extremely power-efficient when in power sleep mode. Direct power connections in a dark color help components blend. The DeepCool PK550D 550 Watt 80 PLUS Bronze Power Supply comes with a 05-year warranty.

keyFeatures: Features: Eye Care, Flicker Free, Low Blue Light

productName: ACER EK220Q H3bi 21.5 inch 1ms 100hz Borderless Full HD Monitor
description: The Acer EK220Q H3bi monitor offers a vibrant visual experience with its 21.5  Full HD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 and a brightness of 250 nits. It has a 1ms response time, a smooth 100 Hz refresh rate, and an impressive 3000:1 image contrast ratio for sharp and fluid visuals. Acer ComfyView technology reduces glare, providing a more comfortable viewing experience. This eco-friendly monitor is equipped with Acer eColor Management for optimal image quality. Acer EK220Q H3bi monitor comes with HDMI and VGA ports, including an inbox HDMI cable for easy connectivity. You have the flexibility to desk or wall-mount it to suit your setup. Acer EK220Q H3bi monitor is designed to enhance your computing experience with its sleek black design.
keyFeatures: Feature: Blue Light Filter, Borderless, Tilt Adjustment

productName: Dahua LM22-B201S 21.45'' IPS 100Hz FHD Monitor
description: The Dahua LM22-B201S 21.45'' FHD Monitor, a high-quality display designed to offer an excellent visual experience at an affordable price. This monitor comes equipped with a Full HD (1920×1080) resolution, ensuring crisp and clear images for your viewing pleasure. The display technology used in this monitor is IPS (In-Plane Switching), which provides superior color reproduction and wide viewing angles. With a refresh rate of 100Hz and an Overdrive (OD) response time of 4ms, it delivers smooth and responsive visuals, making it suitable for gaming and multimedia applications. The monitor features an ultra-narrow bezel design and an elegant appearance with a metal base, giving it a modern and sophisticated look. Its lightweight and cost-effective plastic housing make it easy to move and position as needed. The Dahua LM22-B201S includes built-in 2x 1W speakers, eliminating the need for external speakers in most situations. This allows you to enjoy audio without cluttering your workspace with additional equipment.

productName: Colorful GeForce GT710-2GD3-V 2GB Graphics Card
description: Large fan, strong heat dissipation effeact. It has less calorific value but stronger and more stable performance. Strong processing chip can run multi-task, like design, working, web and movies and so on. Compared with integrated graphics, this video card can give you 10 times video edition speed, 9 times picture edition speed and 5 times web browsing speed, getting you enjoy your picture and video on high resolution settings. What's more, single card also has strong horse-power that can drive 3 high definition display. Can provide relative to the traditional analog technology more high-definition picture quality. HDMI HD mainly in its supports 1280 x 720p, 1920 x 1080i, 1920 x 1080P three modes. HDTV video signal using MPEG2 compression.

productName: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 2GB Graphics Card is a budget-friendly graphics solution that delivers reliable performance for basic computing needs and entry-level gaming. The graphics card comes with 2GB of GDDR5 memory, providing sufficient video memory for everyday tasks, multimedia playback, and light gaming. It utilizes a 64-bit memory interface, which, while not ideal for high-end gaming, allows for efficient data transfer and rendering for its intended applications. The core clock of the GT 710 is set at 954MHz, enabling it to handle high-definition video playback and rendering, as well as casual gaming with modest graphics demands. This graphics card features a variety of video output options, including Dual-Link DVI-D, HDMI, and D-SUB (VGA). This versatility makes it compatible with a wide range of monitors and display setups. The GT 710 supports the PCI Express 2.0 x8 bus interface. While this interface may not be the latest and fastest available, it is well-suited for the card's performance capabilities and target applications. The recommended system power supply requirement for this graphics card is 300 watts.
keyFeatures: Support PCI Express 2.0 x8 bus interface
Output: Dual-Link DVI-D x1, HDMI x1, D-SUB x1

productName: Colorful GeForce GT1030 V3 2GB Graphics Card
description: Colorful announced that it has added the COLORFUL GT1030 2G graphics card to its lineup of Nvidia powered GPUs.This graphics card is based on the recently announced GeForce GT 1030, which has 384 CUDA cores, a 64-bit memory bus, and a 30W power draw that requires no external power connectors. Colorful set the core clock of its GT 1030 at 1,277MHz and the boost clock at 1,468MHz. The card is equipped with 2GB of GDDR5 memory clocked at 6,008MHz.The company boasts an all-solid-state capacitor power delivery design that Colorful stated delivers higher stability and reliability. The custom cooling solution features a black and red plastic shroud mated to an aluminum heatsink and a 90mm cooling fan. The additional cooling enables higher boost clock speeds and overclocking headroom.

productName: Revenger BULLET Mini Tower Micro ATX RGB Gaming Case
description: The Revenger BULLET Mini Tower RGB Gaming Case is a compact-size mini-tower case with an Acrylic Tempered Glass Side Panel. This gaming casing supports MicroATX/ Mini ITX motherboard. It has a spacious design and a fashionable appearance. It is a simple case but offers an effective design. Micro-ATX motherboards are supported by this case. there are metal covers. The side cooling air hole structure ensures smooth air circulation and optimal internal temperature control. Revenger BULLET Mini Tower RGB Gaming Case includes an I/O port with 2x USB 2.0, and 1x 3.5mm HD AUDIO port. The Revenger case comes with 3 x RGB Fan Pre-installed.

productName: Xtreme V9 Full Window ATX Case
description: The Xtreme V9 ATX Case is made in China and also It's Country Of Origin is China. This Xtreme V9 is Full Window Case. It is designed with Front Panel Balck Metal and Left side panel full acrylic design. The case is Full Window type Casing. This Xtreme V9 case is compatible with ATX, Micro-ATX motherboards. It has 1X SSD, 1X HDD. This case also featured with USB1.0 + Audio port, PCI 4PCS with 2 x 12cm 15 LED red cooling fans. The Xtreme V9 ATX Case supports 280mm VGA Card, 248 x 248mm micro motherboard.This low-cost reasonable Xtreme V9 Full Window Case will give you excellent performance in your daily use. This latest Xtreme V9 ATX Full Window Case has no warranty.
keyFeatures: Front Panel Black Metal; 0.55MM Spcc black body

productName: Value-Top V300 Mini Tower Micro-ATX Gaming Casing
description: The Value-Top V300 is a mini tower gaming case with a compact and attractive design that has a complete tempered glass left panel and a mesh panel on the right side. The case accommodates Micro-ATX and Mini-ITX motherboards and graphics cards up to 340mm in length (without the front fan). With a maximum height of 160mm, the shell also accommodates air coolers or liquid coolers for CPU cooling. The housing is 0.8mm thick, ensuring longevity and stability. The Value-Top V300 Mini Tower Micro-ATX Gaming Casing has USB 3.0, USB 2.0, HD audio + mic, 3.5-inch drive bay, 2.5-inch drive bay, and expansion slots for connection and storage. The case also accommodates liquid cooling radiators up to 240mm in diameter and features a mesh design on the top, side, bottom, and front panels for improved airflow. The shell has a transparent side window for displaying your components and lighting effects. The case is 356 x 276 x 304mm in size and weighs 3.8kg. The case also incorporates a handle for easier transportation. The Value-Top V300 is an excellent alternative for gamers looking for a tiny but powerful gaming case.
keyFeatures: Front/Top port: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, Audio Port, 1x HD Audio

productName: Havit KB271 USB Exquisite Keyboard with Bangla
description: Havit KB271 USB Exquisite Keyboard comes with Bangla font, Streamlined and ergonomic design; elegant and beautiful, Easily identifiable keys and not easy to fade, Water-proof Design and Ultra-slim and noise-proof design. This keyboard also has Interface: USB and Number of keys: 104. The Havit KB271 USB Exquisite Keyboard with Bangla has 01 year warranty.

productName: Redragon A101W Keyboard Keycaps
description: The Redragon A101W comes with 104 pcs of high-quality replacement keys for Cherry MX style mechanical keyboards. The keycaps are double-shot injection molded keycaps for crystal clear backlighting. The double injection keycap will give you a cool feeling when you use and never wear it. It is compatible with Cherry MX key switch style, fits most mechanical keyboards. The four sides of the button have been perfectly done without potholes and other defects. The button of each key has been named (such as R1, R2), which is convenient for the player to identify. The Redragon A101W comes with a key puller included for easy key removal. It has a 1-year warranty.
keyFeatures: Mount type: Cherry MX key switch style
Key puller included for easy key removal

productName: IMICE AN-300 RGB Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: A Luminous game keyboard, the IMICE AN-300 RGB Gaming Keyboard, and Mouse Combo. It has a plug-and-play USB interface. High-quality, flexible, and long-lasting silicone keys. There are no drivers to install, it's plug and play, and it works with a variety of operating systems. High-quality, flexible, and long-lasting silicon keys Remember the three-color soft backdrop light of green, purple, and blue. The IMICE AN-300 RGB Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo contain seven buttons as well as a scroll wheel. It has a 1600-2400-3200-5500 DPI switch that can be adjusted. It has a 5 million cycle Switch Life. This is compatible with Windows XP/Vista/Win7/8/10 and Mac OS X. The IMICE AN-300 RGB Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo come with a 01-year warranty.

productName: AULA S13 Wired Backlight Gaming Mouse
img: AULA S13 Wired Backlight Gaming Mouse
description: The AULA S13 Wired Backlight Gaming Mouse is a high-performance gaming mouse designed for gamers who value precision and comfort. With its ergonomic design and comfortable non-slip rollers, this mouse provides a comfortable grip and smooth movement during intense gaming sessions. The AULA S13 is an adjustable DPI speed. The DPI (dots per inch) sensitivity can be adjusted cyclically between four settings: 1200, 1800, 2400, and 3600 DPI. The initial default setting is 1200 DPI, but users can easily switch to a higher or lower sensitivity based on their preferences and gaming needs. The mouse has a rate of return of 125Hz, which ensures a smooth and responsive cursor movement. This is particularly important for gamers who require quick and accurate tracking during fast-paced gameplay. The AULA S13 offers colorful changes with its rainbow backlighting. By simply short-pressing the DPI button, users can easily adjust the lighting effect of the mouse, adding a visually appealing element to their gaming setup.

productName: Xtrike Me GW-600 2.4G Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: The Xtrike Me GW-206 Backlit Optical Mouse has a sleek design that fully supports the thumb and palm. Its ergonomic wireless optical mouse has a great design and color scheme, is lightweight, and is easy to use in daily work. You can operate more freely with wireless technology since there are no cables involved; all you need to do is attach the little receiver. Added forward/backward keys to the Jedel wireless computer mouse. ergonomic design that is cozy. This mouse meets 2.4G Wireless requirements. It has 7 buttons and a backlight that changes colors and breathes. Switch ratings for this mouse total 3 million. The Xtrike Me GW-600 Wireless Mouse comes with a 01-year warranty.

productName: Havit HV-MS64GT Rechargeable Wireless Mouse
description: The Havit HV-MS64GT Wireless Mouse features 2.4 GHz wireless technology that can provide a strong accurate connection within 360 degrees and 10 meters without any interference, you can enjoy being more productive with the USB mouse. It has a small and exquisite appearance for the ultimate comfort of use. And it is easy to carry. The symmetric design makes it suitable for both right- and left-handed. It comes with 3 gears of DPI variable-speed adjustment. 1000-1200-1600 DPI Handle emergencies with ease. It gives precision tracking on just about any surface. The Havit HV-MS64GT comes with a 1-year warranty.

productName: Fantech PHANTOM II VX6 Ergonomic Macro RGB Gaming Mouse
description: The PHANTOM II VX6 is an ergonomic macro RGB gaming mouse designed to elevate your gaming experience. Its gaming optical sensor provides up to 60 IPS / 20G acceleration and on-the-fly adjustable DPI ranging from 400 to 7,200 DPI, giving you precision and accuracy. The Fantech PHANTOM II VX6 Macro Gaming Mouse has a 125Hz polling rate, which ensures quick responsiveness, and a lifetime of 20 million clicks, which ensures long-term durability. With 7 independently programmable buttons, you can personalize your controls. The 1.8m nylon braided USB cable adds to the durability of the device. The PHANTOM II VX6 is designed for comfort and accuracy, making it an ideal companion for long gaming sessions. Its ergonomic design ensures ease of use, promoting optimal gaming performance and casual use alike.

productName: Fantech W190 Dual Mode 2.4Ghz Bluetooth Wireless Mouse Space Edition
description: The Fantech W190 is designed with Silent Switches for all-day use in the workplace or at home. Increase your productivity without disturbing others! Reduce the 'click' sound while still providing adequate feedback. It supports both Bluetooth and 2.4GHz wifi and is compact enough to take with you on the road! You can change your input on the fly since you may connect to two devices at the same time. The Fantech W190 mouse features three DPI options: 800DPI, 1200DPI, and 1600DPI. Meet the accuracy standards for various displays. This mouse has a built-in grip made of durable material that allows you to focus on productivity without interruptions. Efficient, user-friendly, and ergonomic. It has a fully ergonomic and ambidextrous form that allows it to be used comfortably in both left and right hands. The design is extremely light, weighing only 54 grams. The lightweight construction enables all-day usage without cramping or muscular strain. The Fantech W190 Wireless Mouse Space Edition comes with a 01-year warranty.
